conclusion: Calculate gravitational force exerted by remaining part of sphere on point mass m.
Original sphere has mass M and radius R.
Gravitational force by original sphere on point mass m is F_original = G M m / 4R^2.
Smaller sphere removed has radius R/2.
Mass of removed sphere is M' = M / 8.
Gravitational force by removed sphere on m is F_removed = G M m / 32R^2.
Gravitational force by remaining part is F_remaining = F_original - F_removed.
Final answer: Gravitational force exerted by remaining part on m is F = 7G M m / 32R^2.
